    • Method Detail

      • F

        public double F(PVectorMatrix T)
        Computes the log normalizer \f$ F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) \f$.
        Specified by:
        F in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = ( \theta , \Theta ) \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ F(\mathbf{\Theta})=\frac{1}{4} \mathrm{tr}(\Theta^{-1}\theta\theta^T) - \frac{1}{2} \log \det\Theta + \frac{d}{2} log \pi \f$

      • gradF

        public PVectorMatrix gradF(PVectorMatrix T)
        Computes \f$ \nabla F ( \mathbf{\Theta} )\f$.
        Specified by:
        gradF in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        T - natural \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = ( \theta , \Theta ) \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla F( \mathbf{\Theta} ) = \left( \frac{1}{2} \Theta^{-1} \theta , -\frac{1}{2} \Theta^{-1} -\frac{1}{4} (\Theta^{-1} \theta)(\Theta^{-1} \theta)^T \right) \f$

      • G

        public double G(PVectorMatrix H)
        Computes \f$ G(\mathbf{H})\f$
        Specified by:
        G in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = ( \eta , H ) \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ G(\mathbf{H}) = - \frac{1}{2} \log \left( 1 + \eta^T H^{-1} \eta \right) - \frac{1}{2} \log \det (-H) - \frac{d}{2} \log (2 \pi e) \f$

      • gradG

        public PVectorMatrix gradG(PVectorMatrix H)
        Computes \f$ \nabla G (\mathbf{H})\f$
        Specified by:
        gradG in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = ( \eta , H ) \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \nabla G(\mathbf{H}) = \left( -( H + \eta \eta^T )^{-1} \eta , -\frac{1}{2} ( H + \eta \eta^T )^{-1} \right) \f$

        public PVectorMatrix t(PVector x)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        x - a point
        Returns:
        \f$ t(x) = (x , -x x^\top) \f$

      • Lambda2Theta

        public PVectorMatrix Lambda2Theta(PVectorMatrix L)
        Converts source parameters to natural parameters.
        Specified by:
        Lambda2Theta in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        L - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = ( \mu , \Sigma ) \f$
        Returns:
        natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = \left( \Sigma^{-1} \mu , \frac{1}{2} \Sigma^{-1} \right)\f$

      • Theta2Lambda

        public PVectorMatrix Theta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix T)
        Converts natural parameters to source parameters.
        Specified by:
        Theta2Lambda in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        T - natural parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Theta} = ( \theta , \Theta )\f$
        Returns:
        source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = \left( \frac{1}{2} \Theta^{-1} \theta , \frac{1}{2} \Theta^{-1} \right) \f$

      • Lambda2Eta

        public PVectorMatrix Lambda2Eta(PVectorMatrix L)
        Converts source parameters to expectation parameters.
        Specified by:
        Lambda2Eta in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        L - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = ( \mu , \Sigma ) \f$
        Returns:
        expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = \left( \mu , - (\Sigma + \mu \mu^T) \right) \f$

      • Eta2Lambda

        public PVectorMatrix Eta2Lambda(PVectorMatrix H)
        Converts expectation parameters to source parameters.
        Specified by:
        Eta2Lambda in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        H - expectation parameters \f$ \mathbf{H} = ( \eta , H )\f$
        Returns:
        source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = \left( \eta , - (H + \eta \eta^T) \right) \f$

      • density

        public double density(PVector x,
             PVectorMatrix param)
        Computes the density value \f$ f(x;\mu,\Sigma) \f$.
        Overrides:
        density in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        x - point
        param - parameters (source, natural, or expectation)
        Returns:
        \f$ f(x;\mu,\Sigma) = \frac{1}{ (2\pi)^{d/2} |\Sigma|^{1/2} } \exp \left( - \frac{(x-\mu)^T \Sigma^{-1}(x-\mu)}{2} \right) \mbox{ for } x \in \mathds{R}^d \f$

      • drawRandomPoint

        public PVector drawRandomPoint(PVectorMatrix L)
        Draws a point from the considered distribution.
        Specified by:
        drawRandomPoint in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        L - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda} = ( \mu , \Sigma ) \f$
        Returns:
        a point.

      • KLD

        public double KLD(PVectorMatrix LP,
         PVectorMatrix LQ)
        Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between two multivariate Gaussian distributions.
        Specified by:
        KLD in class ExponentialFamily<PVector,PVectorMatrix>
        Parameters:
        LP - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_P \f$
        LQ - source parameters \f$ \mathbf{\Lambda}_Q \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ D_{\mathrm{KL}}(f_P \| f_Q) = \frac{1}{2} \left( \log \left( \frac{\det \Sigma_Q}{\det \Sigma_P} \right) + \mathrm{tr} \left( \Sigma_Q^{-1} \Sigma_P \right) + ( \mu_Q - \mu_P )^\top \Sigma_Q^{-1} ( \mu_Q - \mu_P ) - d \right) \f$
